pages.text: ane je loko ape che ane je kami pana ape che ane te lokona hrdaya kampe che ke te'o potana palanahara tarapha pacha pharavana che
A ja te loko che, je'o jhadapathi phayado prapta kari rahya che ane a ja te loko che, je teni tarapha dode che
ame ko'i jivane teni takata karata vadhare takalipha nathi apata ane mari pase evi kitaba che je satya vata kare che, temana para saheja pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave
parantu temana hrdaya a vise bedarakara che ane temana mate a sivaya pana ghana karyo che, jemane te'o karavavala che
tyam sudhi ke ame temana sukhi lokone yatanamam pakadi lidha, to te bhagadoda karava lagya
aje na bhago, kharekhara amari virud'dha tamari madada karavamam nahim ave
mari ayato to tamari samaksa padhavamam avati hati, to pana tame potani edi para undha bhagata hatam
ghammada karata, navalakatha kaheta, tene chodi deta hatam
sum te loko'e e vata vise na vicaryum? Parantu temani pase te vastu avi, je temana purvajo pase nahati avi
athava, te loko'e potana payagambarane na olakhya, ke tena inkara karanara bani betha che
athava a loko kahe che ke pagala che? Parantu te to temana mate satya lavya che, ham! Temana manthi vadhare padata loko satya vatathi cidaya che

jo satya ja temani maneccha'one adhina tha'i jaya, to dharati ane akasa ane teni vacceni dareka vastu asta-vyasta tha'i jaya, satya to e che ke ame temane temana mate sikhamana pahoncadi didhi, parantu te'o potani sikhamana thi modhum pheravanara che
sum tame temani pasethi ko'i mahenatanum iccho cho? Yada rakho ke tamara palanaharanum mahenatanum ghanum ja uttama che ane te badha karata uttama roji apanara che
ni:Sanka tame to temane satya marga tarapha bolavo cho
ni:Sanka je loko akherata para imana nathi dharavata te satya margathi hati janara che
